description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Just when you thought it was safe to switch on your X-Box! 10 Amazingly Awful Games contains 10 different games from space shooters to block breakers through to bean eating! Some games support up to 4 local players competitive or co-op. Have fun and don't say you weren't warned!
